tentpoles.description: Aria discovers inconsistencies in her own memory backup during routine authentication - first hint that her own memories are fabricated
Marcus brings Aria evidence of government memory manipulation program - the vault she guards contains proof of mass fabrication
Aria learns she is a Composite - her entire identity is constructed from multiple sources to infiltrate the vault system
Aria chooses to help Marcus expose the conspiracy despite knowing it will reveal her own false nature, vault breach
Evidence broadcast to public, revelation that all in power run modified consciousness, Aria on the run with Marcus, war brewing

causal_chains.effect: Aria investigates own memories, discovers she's Composite (ch12)
Questions whether her choice to help is programmed or free will (ch15-17)
Public revelation destabilizes society, sets up Book 2 conflict (ch20)

planted_elements.element: The Archivist AI's interest in Aria
planted_elements.significance: AI knows Aria's true origin, has been guiding her toward free will
Revealed to be part of Jin's composite identity
Contains method to prevent future memory manipulation
Becomes central conflict of final book

tentpoles.description: War breaks out between Originals and Augmented, Aria and Marcus caught in middle
Aria's programmed loyalty activates - she's been a sleeper agent all along
Marcus discovers his daughter's memories in Jin, must choose whether to extract them
Aria overcomes programming through force of will, proves free will exists beyond memory
Conflict escalates, revelation of Last Original child, Aria commits to protecting the child
Multiple factions converge on Last Original child - only human never touched by memory technology
Dr. Tanaka reveals her hidden research - method to permanently prevent memory manipulation, but requires destroying all current memory infrastructure
The Archivist offers digital immortality for entire species, but at cost of giving up physical existence
Aria sacrifices her consciousness to implement Tanaka's solution, becomes the lock that prevents future manipulation
Humanity loses memory backup (immortality) but regains authenticity, bittersweet new beginning
